name: Marine Metagenomic Portal
description: MarRef is a manually curated marine microbial reference genome database that contains completely sequenced genomes.

dataset.name: MarRef
dataset.description: MarRef is a manually curated marine microbial reference genome database that contains completely sequenced genomes.

dataset.name: MarDB
dataset.description: MarDB includes all non-complete sequenced marine microbial genomes regardless of level of completeness

dataset.name: MarCat
dataset.description: MarCat is a gene (protein) catalogue of uncultivable and cultivable marine microorganisms derived from metagenomics samples
dataset.keywords: marine, metagenomic, protein, catalogue, uncultivable, cultivable, microorganism, procariotic, genome
